title: Retford F.C.
text:
Retford Football Club is an <a href="England">English</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Retford">Retford</a>, <a href="Nottinghamshire">Nottinghamshire</a>. They currently play in the .
History.
The club was formed in 2015.They joined the <a href="Central%20Midlands%20League">Central Midlands League</a> and entered the <a href="FA%20Vase">FA Vase</a> for the first time a year later.
Retford FC were crowned champions of the Central Midlands North Division 2018/19 season 
2019/20 season will see them play in the <a href="Northern%20Counties%20East%20League">Northern Counties East League</a> Division One.
Stadium.
The club moved to The Rail in 2017 after ground sharing with <a href="Retford%20United%20F.C.">Retford United</a>. 
The ground has been developed over the short time they have been in situ with floodlights installed, an all seater stand and the necessary requirements for ground grading for the <a href="Northern%20Counties%20East%20League">Northern Counties East League</a> all met. 
The ground is adjacent to the East Coast Main Line where it can be viewed from the trains passing, and a good vantage point of the ground is from the road bridge on Babworth Road.
